definition: to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: Again, the availability of financing is the key.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，是否有可靠的融資也是關鍵。

sentences.english: Commercial projects need to be financed in operation period.
sentences.chinese: 運營期融資主要是針對商業房地產項目而成立。

sentences.english: China is not the only emerging financier playing a major role in Africa.?
sentences.chinese: 中國不僅是在非洲發揮重要作用的惟一的新興融資方。

sentences.english: Therefore, the accurate assessment of the credit risk of STCP is on imminent.
sentences.chinese: 所以，對短期融資券信用風險的準確評估就迫在眉睫。

sentences.english: Financing is difficult in the commercial forest market in China.
sentences.chinese: 目前中國商品林市場融資困難，渠道匱乏。

sentences.english: Financing institution is an important economic category in the economic theory.
sentences.chinese: 融資制度是經濟理論中的一個重要經濟範疇。

sentences.english: These will struggle should they need to raise money in the markets.
sentences.chinese: 如果它們要在市場融資，將需要費一番周折。

sentences.english: The bank also is barred from taking deposits, which means higher financing costs.
sentences.chinese: 農發行也不能吸引存款，這意味着它的融資成本較高。

sentences.english: There are many alternatives in obtaining tandem axle dump truck financing.
sentences.chinese: 有許多替代品在獲得串聯軸自卸車融資。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT The cost of capital is one of the most important factors in making decision of re-raising capital for all marketed companies.
sentences.chinese: 論文摘要融資成本是上市公司融資決策的重要依據。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT The cost of capital is one of the most important factors in making decision of re-raising capital for all marketed companies.
sentences.chinese: 論文摘要融資成本是上市公司融資決策的重要依據。

sentences.english: Stop stressing about the day to day ups and downs of your investments.
sentences.chinese: 不要每天爲自己金融資產的漲漲跌跌而緊張。

sentences.english: We finance more manufactured-home buyers than any other company.
sentences.chinese: 我們比其他公司更多地向預製房屋的買家提供融資。

sentences.english: The good news is that little is truly needed in three-month funding.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是，銀行其實基本不需要期限爲三個月的融資。

sentences.english: Banks are reducing their dependence on wholesale funding and increasing their reliance on "stickier" deposits.
sentences.chinese: 銀行正減少對批發融資的依賴，轉而依靠粘性存款。

sentences.english: Only in this way, it is possible to promote the ability and level of funds circulating.
sentences.chinese: 唯其如此，才能真正提高高校的融資能力和水平。

definition: merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
